Plot: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.
Title: The Little Rascals
Writer: Penelope Spheeris (story), Robert Wolterstorff (story), Mike Scott (story), Paul Guay (story), Stephen Mazur (story), Paul Guay (screenplay), Stephen Mazur (screenplay), Penelope Spheeris (screenplay)
Actors: Travis Tedford, Kevin Jamal Woods, Jordan Warkol, Zachary Mabry
